mdRecord.dcterms:title: Emblemata d. A. Alciati / denuo ab ipso autore recognita, ac, quae desiderabantur, imaginibus locupletata. Accesserunt noua aliquot ab autore Emblemata suis quoq[ue] eiconibus insignita
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Alciati, Andrea, 1492-1550
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Woodcuts by Pierre Eskrich. Except for the privilege and table, each page is enclosed within an ornamental border; some borders are signed "PV" probably for Pierre Vase (i.e. Eskrich)

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Capé. Bookplates of Robert Hoe and R.B. Adam; two different bookplates with cypher CC, i.e. Charles Cousin, according to handwritten note. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 94.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Early works to 1800
